verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w*, \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w violet|strong="H8504"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w fine|strong="H4480"\w* linen, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* vestments \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* wear \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w ministered|strong="H8334"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* places, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* an \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* \w of|strong="H0646"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w violet|strong="H8504"\w*, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* twice dyed, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* \w twisted|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*.

\w With|strong="H0854"\w* embroidered \w work|strong="H4639"\w*: \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w cut|strong="H7112"\w* thin \w plates|strong="H7554"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* drew \w them|strong="H0854"\w* small \w into|strong="H8432"\w* \w threads|strong="H6616"\w*, \w that|strong="H8432"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* might be twisted \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* woof \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* aforesaid colours,

\w And|strong="H3802"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* borders coupled \w one|strong="H8147"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w other|strong="H8147"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w top|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* either \w side|strong="H3802"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* girdle \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* colours, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* two \w onyx|strong="H7718"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, fast \w set|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* closed \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* graven \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* art \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* lapidary, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sides|strong="H3802"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w a|strong="H2803"\w* rational \w with|strong="H2091"\w* embroidered \w work|strong="H4639"\w*, according \w to|strong="H2803"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*, \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w violet|strong="H8504"\w*, \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* twice dyed, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* \w twisted|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*,
Foursquare, \w double|strong="H3717"\w*, \w of|strong="H0753"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* measure \w of|strong="H0753"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w span|strong="H2239"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0068"\w* \w he|strong="H0259"\w* \w set|strong="H4390"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w rows|strong="H2905"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* precious \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* \w in|strong="H0068"\w* it. \w In|strong="H0068"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \w row|strong="H2905"\w* \w was|strong="H0259"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* sardius, \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w topaz|strong="H6357"\w*, \w and|strong="H0068"\w* emerald.
In the \w second|strong="H8145"\w*, \w a|strong="H2905"\w* carbuncle, \w a|strong="H2905"\w* \w sapphire|strong="H5601"\w*, \w and|strong="H8145"\w* \w a|strong="H2905"\w* jasper.
In \w the|strong="H7992"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w*, \w a|strong="H2905"\w* ligurius, an \w agate|strong="H7618"\w*, \w and|strong="H7992"\w* an \w amethyst|strong="H0306"\w*.

\w In|strong="H2091"\w* \w the|strong="H7243"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w*, \w a|strong="H2905"\w* chrysolite, an \w onyx|strong="H7718"\w*, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w a|strong="H2905"\w* \w beryl|strong="H8658"\w*, set \w and|strong="H2091"\w* enclosed \w in|strong="H2091"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w by|strong="H2091"\w* their \w rows|strong="H2905"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w twelve|strong="H6240"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* engraved \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w twelve|strong="H6240"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w each|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* several \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w also|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* rational little \w chains|strong="H8333"\w* linked \w one|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* another \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* purest \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*,

\w And|strong="H2091"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* hooks, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w as|strong="H5414"\w* many \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*. \w And|strong="H2091"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* either side \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rational,

\w On|strong="H5921"\w* which \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w chains|strong="H5688"\w* should \w hang|strong="H5414"\w*, which \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hooks \w that|strong="H5414"\w* stood \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w corners|strong="H7098"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ephod.

These \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* behind \w so|strong="H5414"\w* answered \w one|strong="H8147"\w* another, \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rational \w were|strong="H6440"\w* bound \w together|strong="H5921"\w*,

Being fastened \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* girdle \w and|strong="H1004"\w* strongly coupled \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* violet fillet joined, lest \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w should|strong="H6213"\w* flag \w loose|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* moved \w one|strong="H0834"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w other|strong="H5676"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Lord commanded Moses.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w also|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* tunick \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* \w all|strong="H5980"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* violet,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* hole \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* head \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* upper \w part|strong="H5921"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* middle, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w woven|strong="H2805"\w* \w border|strong="H1961"\w* round \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* hole:

\w And|strong="H8504"\w* beneath \w at|strong="H4639"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* feet pomegranates \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w violet|strong="H8504"\w*, \w purple|strong="H8504"\w*, scarlet, \w and|strong="H8504"\w* fine twisted linen:

\w And|strong="H6310"\w* little bells \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* purest gold, which \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H6310"\w* \w between|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* pomegranates \w at|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* bottom \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* tunick \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w*:

\w To|strong="H5921"\w* wit, \w a|strong="H5921"\w* bell \w of|strong="H5921"\w* gold, \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w pomegranate|strong="H7416"\w*, wherewith \w the|strong="H5921"\w* high priest went adorned, \w when|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* discharged \w his|strong="H5921"\w* ministry, as \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord \w had|strong="H7416"\w* commanded Moses.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* fine linen tunicks \w with|strong="H5921"\w* woven \w work|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* sons:
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* mitres \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* little \w crowns|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* fine linen:
\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w* breeches \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* a girdle \w of|strong="H4701"\w* \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* \w twisted|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, violet, purple, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* scarlet twice dyed, \w of|strong="H4701"\w* embroidery work, as \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w had|strong="H0853"\w* commanded Moses.

\w They|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H4639"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* plate \w of|strong="H3068"\w* sacred veneration \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* purest gold, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* wrote \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* engraving \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* lapidary, \w The|strong="H0853"\w* Holy \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* fastened \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* mitre \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* violet fillet, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* commanded Moses.

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w work|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tabernacle \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* roof \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testimony \w was|strong="H0834"\w* finished: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Israel \w did|strong="H0834"\w* all \w things|strong="H0834"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* offered \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* roof \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* furniture, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rings, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* boards, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* bars, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* pillars, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* sockets,
\w The|strong="H3605"\w* cover \w of|strong="H0168"\w* ramsâ€™ skins dyed red, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* cover \w of|strong="H0168"\w* violet skins,
\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w veil|strong="H6532"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ark, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* bars, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* propitiatory,
\w The|strong="H0853"\w* table, \w with|strong="H0905"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* vessels thereof, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* loaves \w of|strong="H0727"\w* proposition:

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* candlestick, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* lamps, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w furniture|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* oil:

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* altar \w of|strong="H3627"\w* gold, \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ointment|strong="H8081"\w*, \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* incense \w of|strong="H3627"\w* spices:

\w And|strong="H2091"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hanging|strong="H4539"\w* \w in|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w entry|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*:

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* grate, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w bars|strong="H0905"\w*, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* thereof: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w laver|strong="H3595"\w* \w with|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* foot thereof: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hangings \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* court, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* pillars \w with|strong="H3627"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* sockets:

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w hanging|strong="H4539"\w* \w in|strong="H5656"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* entry \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, \w and|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* little \w cords|strong="H4340"\w*, \w and|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* pins thereof. \w Nothing|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H4908"\w* wanting \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H3627"\w* commanded \w to|strong="H4150"\w* \w be|strong="H5656"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ministry|strong="H5656"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, \w and|strong="H0168"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* roof \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* covenant.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* vestments \w also|strong="H0853"\w*, which \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w to|strong="H1121"\w* wit, \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H8334"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w used|strong="H8334"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*,

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* offered \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* finished, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.
